org.hps.online.recon.aida

Class JustEcal

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.online.recon.aida.RemoteAidaDriver
        • org.hps.online.recon.aida.JustEcal

  • public class JustEcal
extends RemoteAidaDriver
    Make plots for remote AIDA display based on Kalman Filter track reconstruction
